author: jleroux
msg: Fix a bug reported by Kiran Gawde at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4440 "OnePageCheckout breaks when you are logged in with userid that belongs to PartyGroup"

OnePageCheckout breaks when you are logged in with userid that belongs to PartyGroup. But the quickcheckout doesn't break. This is due to the fact that EditShippingAddress has following line which returns null.

author: tomaz
msg: Update Linode DNS driver and handle all the "ObjectDoesNotExist" error inside

author: tomaz
msg: Pass connection object to the connectionCls and rawConnectionCls constructor
instead of assigning it afterwards. Also update all the affected code and tests.
